COVID-19 death toll reaches 25 in Nepal as 55-yr-old dies in Pokhara

Khabarhub

KATHMANDU: The death toll from coronavirus pandemic in Nepal has reached 25 after a 55-year-old man died of the deadly virus in Pokhara on Wednesday night. According to Pokhara Academy of Health Sciences, a 55-year-old man, who was admitted to the hospital after he complained of respiratory complications on June 21, succumbed to the pandemic […]
